page.title: 02Ecchinswell Village
page.content: The population of under 400 consists of old Hampshire families, farming folk,retired professionals,a few Americans and week-enders. The{Malthouse Farmshop}is the only shop in the village.It incorporates the post office and general store run by a staff of three. Travellers through this small village will be surprised to find a {transport depot}that employs twelve people.Ten lorries carry plastic,paper and agricultural products all over the country. Apart from those employed in agriculture people travel to nearby towns for work.Cars are essential as public transport is inadequate.The bus runs on a circular route calling at the village six times per week-day.
